t: Futurizta Tech: A Futuristic Gadgets Store To Simplify Lives – startupanz.com
s: July 29, 2021 - During my university life as an engineer, I found Futurizta Tech in 2018 as an E-commerce company selling Futuristic gadgets from other manufacturers. After 1 year of selling other brand’s gadgets, I’ve gathered enough experience and insight to develop my own branded universal cable (Chimera 5-in-1 Cable) by raising a Kickstarter campaign in 2019. Having successfully raised $16,000 AUD in my first campaign, I was invited to participate in Amazon ...
